meta.author: Developer
meta.description: Beautiful, powerful todo list app built with React 18, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Vite for seamless task organization.

steps.content: TaskPro transforms task chaos into organized success using React 18 hooks, TypeScript safety, and Vite speed for ultimate productivity.
Responsive navigation powered by React Router v6 ensures smooth page transitions across desktop and mobile with zero re-renders.
Hero dashboard welcomes users with intuitive onboarding, showcasing real-time stats via custom React hooks for instant motivation.
Live statistics cards track total, active, and completed tasks with Tailwind gradients and backdrop blur for visual appeal.
Total tasks counter updates instantly via optimized useTodos hook, leveraging localStorage for persistent state across sessions.
Elegant task creation form with validation, priority selectors, and due dates uses controlled inputs for flawless React state management.
Title input with focus rings and glassmorphism effects provides accessible, responsive entry points for rapid task addition.
Priority dropdown categorizes tasks into low, medium, high with TypeScript unions ensuring type-safe filtering and analytics.
Switch to analytics page effortlessly, revealing completion rates and priority distributions computed from full todo dataset.
Analytics dashboard visualizes streaks, rates with CSS gradients and progress bars, powered by derived state from useTodos hook.
Settings page offers theme toggles, notifications, and JSON export with confirmation dialogs for secure data management.
TaskPro delivers production-ready React excellence: hooks, TypeScript, Tailwind, Vite. Perfect for scalable, performant task mastery.
